pageTitle: ALEN CLEA : Weekly report on the treasury shares buy-back plan. From December 19 to 22, 2011 | 4-Traders
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {69269=Milan, 23th December 2011, 70619=20/12/2011, 71249=22/12/2011, 69338=ALERION: TREASURY SHARES BUY - BACK With reference to the treasury shares buy-back plan, Alerion Clean Power S.p.A. informs to have purchased, between the 19th December 2011 and the 22th December 2011, n. 26.442 of treasury shares at an average unit price of Euro 3,9906 per share, for a total equivalent value of Euro 105.520,32. Details of the transaction on a daily basis:, 71862=Pursuant to the purchases executed as of 22 December 2011, Alerion Clean Power S.p.A. holds a total amount of n. 245.955 of treasury shares, corresponding to 0,55885% of its share capital., 70934=21/12/2011, 70304=19/12/2011}
textBeforeTable: ALERION: TREASURY SHARES BUY - BACK With reference to the treasury shares buy-back plan, Alerion Clean Power S.p.A. informs to have purchased, between the 19th December 2011 and the 22th December 2011, n. 26.442 of treasury shares at an average unit price of Euro 3,9906 per share, for a total equivalent value of Euro 105.520,32. Details of the transaction on a daily basis: Milan, 23th December 2011 Press Release *Required fields Message : (You can enter multiple email addresses separated by commas) To* : From* : Name : Last Name : Send by mail: 12/23/2011 | 10:53am US/Eastern
textAfterTable: Pursuant to the purchases executed as of 22 December 2011, Alerion Clean Power S.p.A. holds a total amount of n. 245.955 of treasury shares, corresponding to 0,55885% of its share capital.
